attributes.action: "allow all ministers of religion to be able to marry their own peoples and become automatic registrars just like the CofE, Quakers &Rabbi's of the Jewish Faith".
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We feel it unfair in this multi cultural  and multi Faith Country, that ministers of Religion are not allowed to Marry their own people in a act of Marriage just like the C of E, Quakers and Rabbi's in the Jewish faith who automatically become registrars. we feel all ministers of Religion ought to be able to become registrars automatically just like the above.
